document.text:
From: 
(USAWS)" clIMI> 
To: "McNeil, M (CRM)" 
Cc: 
• 0 <SNIMIN>, "SO 
Subject: Ghislaine Maxwell renewed bail application 
Date: Wed, 24 Feb 2021 01:10:34 +0000 
Attachments: MAXWELL_BAIL_APPLICATION_with_EXHIBIT_2-23-17.pdf 
M, 
I hope all is well. Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys filed a third bail application earlier today. As part of that application, they 
proposed that she will renounce her French and British citizenship, claiming that such a renunciation obviates the Court's 
concerns about the validity of waivers of extradition. I have attached their application here. We have not yet been 
ordered to reply, but would be grateful for your thoughts when you have a chance. 
Thanks very much, 
M 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
Tel: 
EFTA00021355
